acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

createRewarder(uint8,address,uint256).details: Creates a rewarder. Only the owner can call this function, except for veMoe rewarders.

getRewarderAt(uint8,uint256).details: Returns the rewarder at the given index for the given rewarder type.

returns._0: The rewarder at the given index for the given rewarder type.

getRewarderCount(uint8).details: Returns the number of rewarders for the given rewarder type.

returns._0: The number of rewarders for the given rewarder type.

getRewarderImplementation(uint8).details: Returns the rewarder implementation for the given rewarder type.

returns._0: The rewarder implementation for the given rewarder type.

getRewarderType(address).details: Returns the rewarder type for the given rewarder.

returns._0: The rewarder type for the given rewarder.

params.initialOwner: The initial owner of the contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRewarderImplementation(uint8,address).details: Sets the rewarder implementation for the given rewarder type. Only the owner can call this function.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

documentation.text:
@dev Initializes the RewarderFactory contract.
 @param initialOwner The initial owner of the contract.
